channel.title: For xerozcheez
channel.description: i dont think you should ever release any newer versions of cheezscape... let people buy it or dont give it to anyone at all... or only share it with known coders... cos half of the people on this forum cant code for shit, all they can do is download a source and change some names and maybe add like a shop or make a ::rich command which gives them like 1b or some shit.... this is my opinion... if you think different then fair enough, but dont flame me about it.

item.title: For xerozcheez
item.dc:creator: @cook cook
item.description:
@cook wrote:

bigmac:

-_- Could be a good idea, but its up to xeroz at the end of the day, and yes lots of people do leach off others work. I think if people do want to carry on and leach they should give all credit to the maker of the source. Oh yes by the way =) i supplied the new update for your server today, the pk points counter onscreen hope you like it

he is 100% right its up to him and theres nothing wrong with noobs puttin commands to get stuff they can do what they want

Read full topic
